column4: Hi, whats the cleanes way to update the nvidia driver to the recent version?
gord: just use gparted to format it
well, just plug it in and see if it shows up in gparted, it won't be mounted if the filesystem is defect
my problem is that the computer does not see it
what happens when you plug it in?
does it show up in gparted?
can you please paste dmesg after you plug it in
hm, that seems to be a bug, what kind of laptop are you using?
there are several reports about this, some say a bios update fixed it
could you please link me where you got that information
Ill try updating the BIOs. Thanks for your help.
